entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
